survey_name: AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user satisfaction and experience with AI-powered customer service chatbots to improve functionality and user interaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer service chatbots?

questions.question_text: What type of issues do you typically use AI-powered chatbots for? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse use cases.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for open text.

script.question_text: What type of issues do you typically use AI-powered chatbots for? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the response accuracy of AI-powered chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the response accuracy of AI-powered chatbots?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered chatbots?

questions.question_text: How often do you need to escalate your issue to a human agent after interacting with an AI chatbot?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who have interacted with chatbots before.
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand escalation frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you need to escalate your issue to a human agent after interacting with an AI chatbot?
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who have interacted with chatbots before.

questions.question_text: Which of the following features would make AI chatbots more useful to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify desired features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for open text.

script.question_text: Which of the following features would make AI chatbots more useful to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered chatbots to others?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered chatbots to others?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using AI-powered chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an 'Other' option for open text.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using AI-powered chatbots?

questions.question_text: How intuitive do you find the navigation and interaction with AI chatbots?
